dcterms:description: DUC2001 provides benchmark datasets along with human evaluation over multiple submitted systems, focusing on the degree to which semantic units in the reference summary are expressed in the system summary.
dcterms:title: DUC2001

dcterms:description: DUC2002 is similar to DUC2001, providing benchmark datasets and human evaluation for summarization systems, with a focus on semantic coverage in system summaries.
dcterms:title: DUC2002

dcterms:creator: Max Grusky
Mor Naaman
Yoav Artzi
dcterms:description: Newsroom is a dataset of 1.3 million summaries with diverse extractive strategies, designed for evaluating summarization systems.
dcterms:title: Newsroom
